scripts.migration:dev: cross-env-shell AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 USE_PINO_PRETTY=true AWS_PROFILE=hassudev npm run setup:dev && ts-node --logError $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --project=tsconfig.json ./migration-cli.ts
scripts.migration:prod: cross-env-shell AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 USE_PINO_PRETTY=true AWS_PROFILE=hassuprod npm run setup:prod && ts-node --logError $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --project=tsconfig.json ./migration-cli.ts
scripts.test: npm run setup && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="./tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register "./**/*.test.ts"
